:::Spears::

She lowered her head, "Yes Master. I shall watch what I say around 
him."  She was a little startled when Prebon kissed her.  She then 
closed her eyes and fell into his kiss.  She looked at him and 
smiled,"Yes master. I shall do as you say."  She walked off and away 
from them and went to the mess hall to get something to eat.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (Has anyone seen Dcoburn? I need him for two of my stories. 
> Soulstice, are Atma Pseudo and Technosis going to fight too? And it 
> mght have been Jericho, but not Gangrel. And I don't think they 
would 
> have Jericho do it, because he's too popular as a face. Test is 
kinda 
> blond, so it was probably him. He did it cause he thought he would 
> take Austin's place in the title match, not Big Show.)
> 
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois could not believe this. Some of the bots had gone down in 
> pain, but the more powerful ones were destroying it with evil. It 
was 
> amazing. He noticed the main one. The one whom the others tried to 
> protect(Deemos). He needed to make a direct link with him, and that 
> would mean physical contact. Than he saw Child come, and go into 
> stasis lock almost immediatly.
> 
> "Child! Not again!" He commed to the base: "Windrazor, Eagel Eye, 
> Afterburner! We need back up! At the end of the main tunnel we're 
in 
> a battle! Child is down!"
> 
> This distraction made the odds low to Vulois. The main boss was 
> powering up an ultimate weapon. But he had to try. If he died in 
the 
> process, Child would lead. He had heard me speak of Battera and 
> Cybershark, and he would contact them and inform them. But it 
looked 
> like peace is finally shattered. Only one last ditch attempt.
> 
> Vulois tried as best he could to dodge most of the firepower in an 
> attempt to get at Deemos.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Trainers
> 
> Prebon looked sternly at Spears.
> 
> "I'm not angry with you. You and I both know who he is, or who he 
> was. I'm afraid that in your anger you could let something slip and 
> he will get curious. I want to make it clear that I made every 
> attempt to keep the promise I made to you. He forced me to do this 
> when he attacked me. I'll talk with Slayer about toning things with 
> you, but just be careful around him, okay? I don't want anything 
> happening to you." He kissed Spears. "You may go now. I need to 
speak 
> with Slayer."
> 
> Prebon walked back into the room and watched Slayer put it on.
> 
> "Excellent. I hope you like it, because you'll be putting it to use 
> right away. Your first mission is to kill Ramulus!"
